To consider other business matters as follows: 1. Increase in authorized share capital of the Company and consequential amendment in the memorandum of association of the Company. 2. Raising of funds by way of issuance of equity shares of face value of ₹ 10 each through qualified institutions placement ( QIP ).3. To constitute a Fund-Raising Committee for managing and dealing with all matters relating to fund raising and issuance of eligible securities.4. To consider and approve notice calling extra ordinary general meeting of the Company.
